Plot: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.
Title: Beauty Shop
Writer: Elizabeth Hunter (story), Kate Lanier (screenplay), Norman Vance Jr. (screenplay)
Actors: Queen Latifah, Alicia Silverstone, Andie MacDowell, Alfre Woodard
tomatoConsensus: Despite a strong performance by Queen Latifah, Beauty Shop is in need of some style pointers.
